website_summaries.verdict: High quality, multi-functional sandbag, ideal for flood control or supporting building erosion.
pros: Extremely easy to fill and tie
These sandbags come with additional tie strings for extra security
Constructed from 850 denier UV coated polypropylene
cons: Some users report these degrade too quickly

customer_reviews.title: Don't use indoors
customer_reviews.text: I filled these with standard sand from Home Depot. Sand comes out of them. Unfortunately I purchased these for stabilizing gym equipment in my canine gym facility. Every time I use them I have to sweep up sand. I tried double bagging but they still leak. Have to put them in heavy duty yard waste plastic bags so they end up being more expensive in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are good for 3 months maximum
customer_reviews.text: These are good for 3 months maximum. They disintegrate and you are left with a pile of sand to clean up. Find another source. Shame on both the manufacturer and the seller/importer. I don't want cheap I want quality and will pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: RSF Homeowner

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: In the past we've purchased other brands of similiar sandbags and they have lasted on the average of about five years. But not these!!! They have literally disintergrated while holding the tarp down to our inground pool. The Bluejays and Robins are taking the smaller pieces laying around the sand, and using them for their nests. The quality of these sandbags is absolutely horrible. I can not in good faith recommend to anyone that they purchase these sandbags.
customer_reviews.author: longnest1

customer_reviews.title: Changed my review!
customer_reviews.text: POSTED after one week: Like everything so far about them except the ties. Could be better. But if I think of it in a year I will let you know how they held up in our market garden. Thanks. Very quick delivery. UPDATE: One month and they have all broken down!!!!!! Those in the sun and those not in the sun! I've got ones I bought at Lowe's a year ago with sand in them and they are still in perfect condition-heavy but just fine. These things are awful! Run! don't walk.
customer_reviews.author: P. Alber

customer_reviews.title: Did not last through a season.
customer_reviews.text: We get sand bags on a yearly bases to last one year. The last ones I got at the local fire dept., however I opted to purchase these in October 2017 via amazon. We are in Los Angeles, California and we did need to fill and place them until January 2018 and it is March 26, 2018 and they are shredded to hell. I have included some pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sandbags
customer_reviews.text: I had some sandbags I use for weight in my truck bed during winter but the bags were breaking apart so wanted to see if I could transfer into new sandbags. These worked great. Bags appear to be a of good durability and there was easy to just put old bag and all in the new bags. Tying off bags no issue either.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long drawstrings
customer_reviews.text: Rapid delivery.Sandbags are disposable so not much to write except good price,rapid delivery and one nice touch is a long drawstring for tying them closed.Just got them for winter traction in the bed of my pickup.Ten small shovels of sand so they easily hold 80lbs
customer_reviews.author: Jayman

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I put sand in them, hoping I wouldnt need them. Maybe 1 month with sand in it and the bags are literally falling apart. I went to go move them and they all tore and shredded. Dont waste your money unless it's a one time use.
customer_reviews.author: amazonian

customer_reviews.title: BAGS WILL BREAK DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I spent hours bagging pea gravel and pumice in these bags. A couple weeks later I tried moving the bags to a new location in my yard and they broke, spilling gravel everywhere. I then bought the burlap bags I should have bought in the first place. They are pricier but worth it because they DON'T BREAK!
customer_reviews.author: g_forcewinds

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bags to build a coffer dam to hold water back while we repaired our earthen dam. Within 2 weeks the bags had degraded so much that when we attempted to remove them the bags split. Not all the bags, but 6 of the 20. They may be good for a very short term use but not an extended use.
customer_reviews.author: Photogal

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy. We had ordered last year
customer_reviews.text: The sand bags arrived promptly and were just what we needed. Strong and sturdy. We had ordered last year, too, and were quite satisfied. I have old sand bags but they have hardened, so I just loosen the sand and put it into these new ones. Now if it would just rain in Southern California, I will really be happy.
customer_reviews.author: David Wilk

customer_reviews.title: These are so cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: If you plan on needing sandbags for more than one season, do NOT buy these. These lasted for one rainy season, which in Arizona is not that rainy, and when I went to pick up and store for the winter, 8 of the 12 bags I had used split open. Some at the tie, some right in the middle. Unless you want to have the BIG mess I had, steer clear of these.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Strong, tuff, and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Bags are really nice. I did a little research on my own, recommend filling bags 1/2 to 2/3's full. This allows room for the sand to settle to help fill any small spaces. Make sure to stagger your seams as you stack the bags. You don't receive instructions so once filled I folded the top over slightly, then rolled over a couple times and tied the bag tight seams to work good.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Seevers

customer_reviews.title: Destroy by fire,now water the bible is revealing itself stay blessed
customer_reviews.text: Lord knowa these are need here in florida all it does is rain and flood ,but thank God for grance and mercy no hurricane yet
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Morrell

customer_reviews.title: Great for making shooting sandbags.
customer_reviews.text: This may be an unconventional use for these bags, but they do make great sandbags for shooting. I filled a few with simple play sand and was all set. They're durable and hold up against my AR15 and M1A.
customer_reviews.author: David Taraian

customer_reviews.title: Just received, haven't put to use
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use them as of yet, but I plan to in case there is a tropical system or hurricane this season. The only thing I can anticipate is maybe needing to use a zip-tie to really secure the ties once the bags are full. I have small fingers and might not be able to tie them securely as is, so the zip ties may help me secure them tightly. Thank you for the affordability of the product!
customer_reviews.author: S. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Speedy delivery
customer_reviews.text: Product update! CRAP! I have had these bags less than 4 weeks and they have already disintegrated in the weak Montana sun. NO UV protection. Arrived quickly and, well, they hold the sand quite nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Seymour

customer_reviews.title: ... on a project at home and this was the perfect storage solution for next spring/summer
customer_reviews.text: I needed storage for sand and gravel I used on a project at home and this was the perfect storage solution for next spring/summer. The number of bags was perfect for me and they stack very nicely as they are designed to do. Fortunately I don't have a water control need, but if I do I will buy these again for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: grives

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery and Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Price and quality was good and Prime offered free next day delivery with $35.00 order. Only downside was I wish green was offered as next day delivery to blend in with landscaping, but we needed quick delivery for a tropical rain event.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bags that will easily last a couple seasons
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bags that will easily last a couple seasons. Ties are stabbed thru the top edge of the bag where they can't blow away, but are easily pulled free to use closing the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Divertom

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased with these bags at first
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with these bags at first. I bought them to store sand in I need later for a sand box. Now, they have DISINTEGRATED! Just a few months later. Why would anyone want a biodegradable sand bag? Isn't the purpose of a sandbag to last with sand in them? I have lost $70 worth of very white sand I special ordered!
customer_reviews.author: Cecil W. McMillan

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT CAME EARLIER THAN EXPECTED WHICH WAS GREAT AS A STORM WAS APPROACHING
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT CAME EARLIER THAN EXPECTED WHICH WAS GREAT AS A STORM WAS APPROACHING . GREAT DURABLE AND REUSABLE PRODUCT. VERY HAPPY WITH THE PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander K. Girevendulis

customer_reviews.title: U.V. rating is worthless
customer_reviews.text: Filled these bags approximately 4 weeks ago. We purchased these particular bags because it said U.V. protection and needed them for use on our roof. I went to move one today and it fell apart in my hands. I now have to shovel the sand again into new bags that I have had to purchase in town. Twice the work twice the money!!! NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: Peter N. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great bags, little pricey
customer_reviews.text: Have not used the bags but they are of good quality and will suit any purpose for which you need sand bags. I didn't use them because they didn't arrive in for a hurricane. But from the looks of them I'd say they're a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these to protect our lakeshore, after less than one summer they are all splitting open. If you step on one, that's all it takes and it has a big hole! The previous owner bought sand bags for the same reason, and a lot of those are over 5 years old, and still good. Sure wish I knew where they came from. I WOULD NOT buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs double bagged
customer_reviews.text: The bad busted open as I lifted them off a scale after weighing them. I had to double bag each one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sandbags are great I have luckily not had to use yet but ...
customer_reviews.text: Sandbags are great I have luckily not had to use yet but they are the right kind and no one supplies these anymore in Florida, you have to buy them. Last year we had to use trash bags for Irma. Keep offering them we are in need!!!
customer_reviews.author: tally888

customer_reviews.title: For my application orange is fine with me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these white sand bags but I got orange sand bags. For my application orange is fine with me. The sand bags are a heavy duty bag with a tie on the top. Works good. Cost is fair and shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: papa ed

customer_reviews.title: Good product / Good Vendor
customer_reviews.text: Look to be good sturdy bags. Like the tie cords attached. Hoping not to need them, but it is hurricane season here in Florida. I would have liked them to be a little smaller, but seems to be the standard size. Received order as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Highway Star

customer_reviews.title: These sandbags will do the job!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, held up to full sand, also held up when my husband tied them off and then TOSSED them into my car, one on top of the other!!! I was expecting one to break open and fill the car with sand but I was wrong. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely useless. Do not purchase these bags
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these sandbags in June, filled them in August. They have completely disintegrated in 2 months. Absolutely useless. Do not purchase these bags!
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Ties on the top of the bags are a plus
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the opportunity to use them yet and I hope I don't have to. I ordered these on a holiday weekend and I received them very quickly. They are going to be great to use and the price was very good.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey s sutton

customer_reviews.title: Product was ok but didn’t receive them until long after the date stated at the time of order
customer_reviews.text: They were as discribed, but I’m giving this 3 stars because I ordered them because we had a hurricane coming and it showed I would have them in plenty of time to fill them to protect my home, but didn’t actually get them until almost a week AFTER the hurricane hit.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Lange

customer_reviews.title: I filled these bags with sand to use as weight ...
customer_reviews.text: I filled these bags with sand to use as weight for a shade umbrella. Within 3 weeks of being in the sun, the bags disintegrated, causing the sand to spill over onto the deck. These bags should never be sold for outdoor use. They are absolutely worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Fill them up!
customer_reviews.text: They work as advertised. I haven't had them long enough to see how they hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Clawhandle1

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: Does not perform as advertised. After carrying these bags full of sand up a steep, they only lasted 4 months before it began to deteriorate from the weather.
customer_reviews.author: New Tester

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These bags completely fell apart after a couple months outdoors. Disintegrated into fine particles which were difficult to gather. I would not recommend this product at all!
customer_reviews.author: O. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Shipped on time, arrived on time. All set For the hurricane. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: C. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Custom fill for easier handling. Save your back!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great! I can fill em up if I need to, or I can make em lighter for easier handling. So much easier to custom fill for weights in the back of your truck in the winter. I was tired of hefting 90 lb bags from retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel G Smith

customer_reviews.title: Holding down pool cover
customer_reviews.text: Good product! I checked off for red bags, got white ones! Not sure what happened but white will be fine.... using to hold down pool cover for the winter! We’ll see in the spring how they hold up?? Spring came and the bags didn’t hold up, they broke apart like tissue paper!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dion

customer_reviews.title: They were not white. They were Caltrans orange.
customer_reviews.text: They were not white. They were Caltrans orange. Major eyesore
customer_reviews.author: john v amaya

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use them yet. Appear to be well constructed. It would be nice !f there was an inexpensive sleeve with a funnel at to that could be insert in bag to assist when filling. I have a piece of quick-tude O plan to use when I do fill them.
customer_reviews.author: Fred J. Noel

customer_reviews.title: For emergency standby.
customer_reviews.text: I have not had to use them and home I never do. I have a home on the shore in Connecticut. I will need them in case of a hurricane.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, great value, I use them for dried feed corn, they are sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Rich P in NJ

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for weight distribution on a boat. Would've give 5 stars but had to use 2 bags for complet dust control. Overall good, tough bags.
customer_reviews.author: Beck Newton

customer_reviews.title: HOLES IN BAGS !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Four out of twenty bags had holes --Lots of rain on the East Coast this summer, (Flooding) bags were filled with sand placed to keep water out. The four with holes did not work very well. Would not hold sand....
customer_reviews.author: Lona Aiken

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The bags arrived as promised which was crucial seeing that I needed to get my hurricane preparations done ASAP. The bags are a good quality material and each came with it's own string for secure tying. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Judith L  Wroten

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: They worked great and got the job done we used them for some minor renovation debris.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ann Labarbera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sand bags worked great stopping A leak at my pond spillway
customer_reviews.author: Charles P.

customer_reviews.title: Sandbags as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Used for sandbags. Just received and set up so no experience with longevity yet. Seem good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Better quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve filled my share of sandbags, being a retired Marine, these are of a higher quality than I thought they were.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Minimized damage in Irma
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in 1 day, which we needed in our prep for Hurricane Irma. The bags were sturdy stacked great. After the storm I bought 200 more for the inevitable next hurricane. They take up no space (empty) and I know I'll have extra to help neighbors. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah V.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived last Thursday.  Filled them on Monday night!
customer_reviews.text: Product was purchased "just in case I needed sandbags in the future". SC is expecting a visit from Hurricane Florence. The bags were easy to handle. Easy to fill and Easy to tie and stack. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra G. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Deteriorates very quickly in the sun
customer_reviews.text: I used these sandbags to hold my trampoline in place. Unfortunately in the sun this product just deteriorates very quickly. Don't buy this product if it is going to be in the sun. I even double bagged it as you can see from the picture. It was a waste of $. I purchased burlap bags instead...hoping they will hold up better.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Talty

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these is very sub par, I bought this in June and most of them have completely deteriorated.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what I needed to weigh down a swimming pool cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my sons house and they’re great. Heavy duty and easy to fill.
customer_reviews.author: LYNN

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the bag was very good. The included ties worked well
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the bag was very good. The included ties worked well. The size was as advertised but would recommend you offer a smaller size as well in the future. A size that maybe holds half as much sand. Good product and would recommend it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Aldus

customer_reviews.title: Not made to last
customer_reviews.text: If you leave these things full and in the sun they deteriorate in about 2-3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Not Used

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not have to use them. But will have just in case we have another Harvey!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: They disintegrated after a short time and made a real mess.
customer_reviews.author: H. I.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: use these bags when I run out of bags to dump the kitty litter.
customer_reviews.author: pot cleane

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the purchase. These will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good Product.
customer_reviews.text: Tough, functional and a reasonable price. I am using these to make a bullet stop behind targets. They hold up well and stop high powered rifle rounds well.
customer_reviews.author: Ohsweethome

customer_reviews.title: the bags themselves are great--if needed they can hold about ...
customer_reviews.text: the bags themselves are great--if needed they can hold about 50lbs of sand, and each bag has its own tie. I had issues with timely shipping, but I am presuming that storms at the time were the main reason for the delay
customer_reviews.author: patrick morey

customer_reviews.title: They are orange and are not dustproof. I used ...
customer_reviews.text: They are orange and are not dustproof. I used them because I had a deadline to meet. I had to put sand in plastic bags and then put it in the orange, not-dustproof bag.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jalbert

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: Great bags , but they only send 17 bags! Suppose to get 20!
customer_reviews.author: michael s.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my use !
customer_reviews.text: They are great! I filled them with small rocks and used them as weights for my patio furniture
customer_reviews.author: Shari Ackerly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pre-staging for this years hurricane season. Way easier than using 30 gallon trash bags!
customer_reviews.author: swiderskys

customer_reviews.title: Good medium duty bag.
customer_reviews.text: I found them to be good medium duty bags. They are not as tear or puncture resistant as industrial strength canvas bags but they are working fine for me. And a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They will split open in less than a year in the sun.
customer_reviews.text: Totally useless. There is no way these are UV stabilized. After less than a year in the sun they all split open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great help
customer_reviews.text: I just got them and will not be using them until the next hurricane. They look good so I’m happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Sandbags
customer_reviews.text: The seller sent the item promptly! Very satisfied and would order them against n!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli M.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as ordered
customer_reviews.text: The bags are exactly as described! I was glad to get them ahead of hurricane season.
customer_reviews.author: kchouston

customer_reviews.title: They are twice the size of what I bought local ...
customer_reviews.text: They are twice the size of what I bought local last year so much nicer will buy again but have extra
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for twenty bags
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the size and quality we wanted. Great price for twenty bags.
customer_reviews.author: H. Jett

customer_reviews.title: The sandbags were great but there were only 15 instead of 20
customer_reviews.text: The sandbags were great but there were only 15 instead of 20. someone didn't do a good job of packaging. Counted them several times!
customer_reviews.author: LInda Baumgartner

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not worn it
customer_reviews.text: I had bags before that stood up well these broke open in just a week or so
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fill and tie
customer_reviews.text: Worked outstanding! Arrived just in time for hurricane Irma and prevent flooding. Easy to fill and tie.
customer_reviews.author: tcrham

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bags
customer_reviews.text: The bags are well made and strong. The plastic tie on top is flimsy. I used my own zip ties.
customer_reviews.author: Parvinder Ahluwalia

customer_reviews.title: Strong held the sand good
customer_reviews.text: Flooding around the house did the job. Keep the water out
customer_reviews.author: diana solis

customer_reviews.title: I purchased and filled these bags on May 10 and ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and filled these bags on May 10 and 30 days later I took the attached picture. As you can see these bags are worthless.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just what i needed for weight in my truck BEFORE the snows of winter
customer_reviews.author: Gregory E. McKelvey

customer_reviews.title: Used during Hurricane Irma and were very sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly as advertised. Used during Hurricane Irma and were very sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: trish

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The sand bags are strong and useful to store extra sand for later use. We left the sand bags with sands in them outside and everything is still in tact despite the heavy rain and wind.
customer_reviews.author: Tu

customer_reviews.title: They worked out great!!
customer_reviews.text: These sand bags were just the thing I was looking for. They worked out great!!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Williams

customer_reviews.title: Sand bags not bags of sand!
customer_reviews.text: F.it the need I had for blocking. Product as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for storage. Will degrade quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Within 1 month of filling these bags with dirt, they started busting or degrading.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Williams

customer_reviews.title: the bags arrived quickly. They appear to be of ...
customer_reviews.text: the bags arrived quickly. They appear to be of high quality. I have just started on the project, but the bags are working very well.
customer_reviews.author: Henry M

customer_reviews.title: bags worked great to devert water from around our swimming pool during ...
customer_reviews.text: bags worked great to devert water from around our swimming pool during hurricane Irma.
customer_reviews.author: Caryl Donnellan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say... They're sand bags. They worked as advertised- they held dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: I am looking for something much better to hold down my silage tarp for weed control
customer_reviews.text: These sand bags have disintegrated in less than 4 months. I am looking for something much better to hold down my silage tarp for weed control.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Olson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bags are working just great...no more water coming into my lower level door
customer_reviews.author: Andy d.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bags came exactly as they were described and are exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Traci C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for sand. Included tie is a big help. Don't overfill.
customer_reviews.author: Big Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and available next day
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these as Hurricane Dorian was moving toward our home. Next day delivery, great quality - very grateful!
customer_reviews.author: jaxmandue

product_meta.title: Sand Bags, 14 X 26 Empty White Woven Polypropylene Sandbags with UV Coating Protection, Ties Included, Waterproof, Dust Proof. (20 Bags)

Introducing The High Quality Propylene Sandbags,
The World's Best Sandbags For Convenient & Hassle Free Usage.

From flood control to erosions - these sandbags will fit your needs perfectly!

Therefore, they are designed to be top-line 
and exceed your highest expectations!

of excellent use without rotting or breaking apart!

They are incredibly easy to fill while the ties on each bag

They are considerably cheaper than buying them individually in a surplus store!

If you want the assurance that you are buying 
the #1 best propylene sandbags on the market, 
then these ones will definitely fit your needs!

What are you waiting for?

Don't Lose Any More Time Scroll Up & Click Add To Cart Now Before We Run Out Of Stock!
